This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
require(stringr)
library(ggmap)
register_google(key = "")
```

```{r}
crime <- read.csv("crime.csv")
```


```{r}
require(ggmap)
bodily_crimes_2015 <- crime[crime$OFFENSE_DESCRIPTION == "THREATS TO DO BODILY HARM" & crime$YEAR == "2015",]

bodily_crimes_2017 <- crime[crime$OFFENSE_DESCRIPTION == "THREATS TO DO BODILY HARM" & crime$YEAR == "2017",]

map.center <- geocode("Boston, MA")
Bos_map <- qmap(c(lon=map.center$lon, lat=map.center$lat), zoom=12)

g <- Bos_map + geom_point(aes(x=Long, y=Lat), data=bodily_crimes_2015, size=3, alpha=0.2, color="red") + 
  ggtitle("try")
print(g)

g <- Bos_map + geom_point(aes(x=Long, y=Lat), data=bodily_crimes_2017, size=3, alpha=0.2, color="red") + 
  ggtitle("try")
print(g)
```

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Cmd+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).
